mapper.insert: insert into basic_category (id, code, name, parent_id, status, deleted, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update basic_category set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, parent_id, status, deleted, description from basic_category
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basic_category (id, code, name, parent_id, status, description) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE basic_category SET code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, code, name, parent_id, status, description FROM basic_category WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY code
